text: Those are the people of the Right Hand. That is, those who have kept themselves safe from the horrors (ahwāl) of that Day. They have no [sensory] perception other than of Him (lā yuḥissūna dūnahu), just as they were in this world; [thus they attain] life with Life itself (ḥayāt bi-ḥayāt), eternity with Eternity itself (azaliyya bi-azaliyya), and a mystery with Mystery itself (sirr bi-sirr). But God, Glorified and Exalted is He, knows best.His words, Exalted is He:
